akn:section.akn:heading: Disposition of rights in educational awards

akn:content.akn:p: § 212. Disposition of rights in educational awards No scholarship, fellowship, training grant, or other funding agreement made by a Federal agency primarily to an awardee for educational purposes will contain any provision giving the Federal agency any rights to inventions made by the awardee. (Added Pub. L. 98–620, title V, § 501(14), Nov. 8, 1984, 98 Stat. 3368.)
